history.text: Hi, can you tell me the name of the movie please?
Avengers
Do you like super hero movies?
Oh cool, yes I watch them with my son all the time. Who is the main character actor?
There are many, but Robert Downey Jr is listed as the top guy
Love him as an actor in general. Who is the guy that plays the Hulk?
Mark Ruffalo is Bruce Banner/ Hulk. Did you get a movie as well?
No I didn't get any other information at all. I want to date mark Ruffalo, unfortunately, I think he's taken. LOL. Was Gwynth Paltrow in this one?
Not listed on here, but Scarlett Johansson is!
What's the name of her character? Is she the only one that doesn't really have super powers?
I believe she was, she was black widow. I thought Chris Hemsworth was amazing as Thor
Is the Avengers the one where there is a fight scene between Thor and Hulk?
It is, i'm just not sure if it's the first one or the second one
What is the main plot of this one? They all sort of meld into one in my brain?
You know it doesn't say on here and for the life of me i can't remember either. It looks like Loki tried to take over the earth but was thwarted off
OK, I'm thinking it's the one where all those metal "dinosaurs" appear in the attack scene. What other info does the material given to you offer?
Not a whole lot, just the review ratings which for the metacritic are surprisingly low.
What was the rating?
only a 69/100
The rotten tomatoes was 92% which is good
hmmm, must have been someone comparing it to Shakespear or something because as far as superhero movies, the whole franchise is pretty awesome. What rating do you think it should have gotten?
I agree way more the 9/10 than a 7. I thought it was a fantastic movie myself!
My kid would say 10/10 and I'm not that far behind. A lot of the lines go right over his head. He just likes the action.
Most kids do, i think that's about all that i have been given information wise
What does the 69/100 say about the movie?
They don't give the review just the rating oddly enough
Well I will probably see the Avengers at least 3 more times in my life time. You?
I'm sure plenty my son is only 10 months old so we haven't even started having to watch them yet.
LOL, he'll be dressing like a super hero by Halloween and wil know how to say Ironman before he can count to 10. I still wonder why they would give the movie such a low rating.

uid2response.feedback: My son loves the Avengers franchise and I will probably watch the movie at least 3 more times in my lifetime.
